shri lanka kandayama indiyawa samanga ekdina tharanga malawa aarambha kale indiyawe kridakayanta pamanak nowa indiya krida lolinatada yam chakithayak athi karawamini.aandolanathmaka dilli test tharangaye duma nisa asarana wu shri lanka kridakayan ema duma aashwasa kara ekdina tharangawaliya aarambha wu dharmashala kridanganaye gindara lesin ema duma pita kala bawa indiya krida loliyeku apuru satahanak web adawiyaka satahan kara thibenu dakiya haki wiya.

wanchawa dushanaya udesa thama aramunu itu kara ganimata kawurun kese katayuthu karamin sitiya da ratata awashya nokiliti deshapalana wyaparaya kumana abhiyoga hamuwe wuwa da jaya ganna bawa awadharanaya kala janadhipathiwaraya sorun nowana, sorakam nokarana saha sorakamkala bawata chodana nomathi parlimenthuwe sitina siyaludenata pirisidu rajayak godanangaganimin idiriyata yamata thama arayum karana bawa da kiya sitiyeya. 2015 wasare janadhipathiwaranayen menma parlimenthu mathiwaranayen paradunu shri lanka nidahas pakshaya mema pebarawari 10 wanada palath palana mathiwaranayen wishishta jayagrahanayak labagatha haki ayurin mewana wita shakthimath kara thibena bawa prakasha kala janadhipathithuma wanchawen dushanayen thora pirisidu palanayak apeksha karana ratata aadaraya karana siyalu janathawa ee samanga ada athwal bandagena sitina bawa da kiya sitiyeya. 1994 pihituwagath aanduwe palamu panatha wu allas ho dushana chodana wimarshana komisan sabha panatha sammathakaragena me wana wita wasara 23 k gathawa thibuna da ema wasara wisi thuna purawatama dushana chodana yatathe nadu pawara waradikaruwan bawata pathwa aththe pudgalayan 4 denek pamanak bawa mehi di sandahan kala janadhipathiwaraya eeta pradhana hethuwa wuye ema parikshana nisi lesa itukirimata ida nodima saha wisheshayen pasugiya rajaya samaye araliyagaha mandiraye sita adhikaranaya wetha labunu durakathana amathum bawa da kiya sitiyeya.
eya honda kellek..
aa eeta kalin jathika kodiya ada kumbau karanawa.

inna hitinna thanak nathiwa mahaparata watuna minisek, pare basnawathum pala thamage niwahana bawata pathkara ganima pilibanda katha puwathaki me.ranasinha mudiyanselage punchibanda mahanuwara pradeshaye pudgalayek. 1956di pamana kolambaa liptan samagame rakiyawak labi dawasakata ru. 4.50 padiyak labamin sathutin jiwithaya arambau mohu wasara kihipayakata pasu wiwahayak karagena sathutin jiwithaya patangena atha.daruwan 3 denekda labimen pasu mohuta rakiyawenda aswennata siduwiya.
